reviewText: This video is for ourselves since we have literally worn our old one out.  It has been and will continue to be the foundation of our Tai Chi at home.  The setting and sound and voice are perfect.  The new tape will assure that we will continue to have enjoyment, relief from stress and an easing of the processes of aging.

I love this short, but wonderful routine in this video. Nikki is a pro and moves so gracefully, you just want to sit and watch her all day. However, that won't help you one bit, so get this and try it for yourself. Gets energy moving throughout the body.
